thread.title: Big B completes 48 glorious years in Bollywood
thread.title_full: Big B completes 48 glorious years in Bollywood

title: Big B completes 48 glorious years in Bollywood
text: Be the first one to review. We have sent you a verification email. To verify, just follow the link in the message 4 /21 20 reasons why we love Amitabh Bachchan Amitabh travels in train to support cancer charity Amitabh Bachchan is a philanthropist. He supports various causes and charities that he believes in. The actor recently took to Twitter to share pictures of himself singing in a local train. The actor was seen travelling the local from VT to Bhandup to support Saurabh, who sings in locals. Saurabh does the same to lend his support for the cause of charity for cancer. Big B also sang along with Saurabh. Tweeting pictures of the same, he wrote, "T 2059 -Local from VT to Bhandup to support Saurabh, who sings in locals for charity to cancer .. sang with him .." Amitabh Bachchan had recently attended a Mata Ki Chowki with wife, Jaya Bachchan. Read on to know more... All Comments ()
